name: Endless Runner Game (JonathanFisher)
description:
This is an endless runner game project created using the BOLTSprites Engine in Visual Studio (C++) during my first year at university (2021).

GAMEPLAY INSTRUCTIONS:

Collect coins and gems to increase your score, the rarer rainbow gems offer the most points. In order to extend the timer allowing you to get a better score  you must collect all clocks you see. Avoid crates, barrels and pitfalls at all cost!

Controls:

Jump - J key
